INSERT INTO tzj_tenderrecord_transfer_log (FK_USER_ID, FK_tenderrecord_ID, ADD_TIME, TS, DR, IS_SUCCESS, MESSAGE, FK_BORROW_ID, oid, STATUS) SELECT distinct rbt.user_id, rbt.id AS TID, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()), '1', 0, '新增流水，等待投之家返回处理结果', rb.id AS bid, CONCAT(${OId},rb.id) AS oid, rb.status AS status FROM rocky_borrow rb INNER JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt ON rb.id = rbt.BORROW_ID INNER JOIN tzj_member_binding tmb ON tmb.user_id = rbt.user_id INNER JOIN rocky_member rm ON rm.id = tmb.user_id AND rm.TYPE = 0 LEFT JOIN tzj_tenderrecord_transfer_log tttl ON tttl.FK_BORROW_ID = rb.ID AND tttl.FK_tenderrecord_ID = rbt.ID WHERE tmb.DR = '1' AND tmb.IS_SUCCESS = 1 and rb.STATUS in (4,5,42,2,-1,-2,-3) AND (tttl.ID IS NULL or (tttl.ID IS not NULL and tttl.IS_SUCCESS = 0) OR (tttl.ID IS not NULL and tttl.IS_SUCCESS = 1 AND tttl.STATUS = 2))
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
